timeline.bodyText: How about we print out the actual values of the arguments here?
timeline.author: jackjlli

timeline.message: Adding support of logical functions AND and OR
Adding support of logical functions AND and OR

timeline.bodyText: Should we support multi-value column as well? If not, can we add some description on this class?
timeline.author: jackjlli

replies.bodyText: This function expects the arguments to be boolean, internal implementation is loosen to numerical value. Multi-value doesn't have too much meaning here, e.g.  we can expect argument to be a=10 or b in (1,2,3) to be either 1 or 0.
replies.author: xiangfu0
